abstract: American stocks decline for third consecutive day due to disappointing earnings reports and prospects from several large companies.
lead_paragraph: Stocks moved lower in afternoon trading after disappointing earnings from several big companies, including American Express, Caterpillar and 3M.

headline.main: Market Extends a Losing Streak as Earnings Roll In
headline.print_headline: Disappointing Earnings and Outlooks Drag U.S. Shares Down for Third Straight Day

snippet: Stocks moved lower in afternoon trading after disappointing earnings from several big companies, including American Express, Caterpillar and 3M.
